name: radicale-calendar
description: MCP server for Radicale calendar operations
author: ARK2.0 Team

stdio.description: Standard input/output transport for local MCP communication

http.description: HTTP transport with WebSocket upgrade for remote MCP communication

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List all available calendars in the Radicale server
tools.returns: JSON string containing list of calendar names

tools.name: get_events
tools.description: Get events from a calendar within a specified date range

calendar_name.description: Name of the calendar (optional, uses first available if not specified)

start_date.description: Start date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

end_date.description: End date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

tools.returns: JSON string containing list of events with their details

tools.name: create_event

calendar_name.description: Name of the calendar to create the event in

end.description: End datetime in ISO format (optional, defaults to start + 1 hour)

tools.returns: JSON string with created event details and ID

calendar_name.description: Name of the calendar containing the event

event_id.description: ID of the event to update

start.description: New start datetime in ISO format

end.description: New end datetime in ISO format

calendar_name.description: Name of the calendar containing the event

event_id.description: ID of the event to delete

examples.description: Get events for the next 7 days
examples.expected_result: List of events in the specified date range
Event created successfully with generated ID
